title: Black Screen After Pressing Launch - Help PLZ
body:
im Getting so annoyed i have been trying for ages to get my league client working, but everything i have tried doesnt work.

after i load the patcher then click launch, the log in screen is just black.

really frustrating, please help

cheers

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), let me know if this helps.

done that, it didn't work. also have tried deleting everything to do with league, that didn't work, i updated my adobe air and my direct x9 that didnt work.

i don't understand how it was fine one day and now its just playing up. so frustrating .
Could you check to make sure you've got all available Windows updates installed? If not, please run Windows Update and install them.
i have windows 7, and everything is installed. how can it go from working to not working?

Could you provide your latest launcher, patcher and lolclient logs for me, these can be found in the following directories. (Please put the log files on [pastebin](http://pastebin.com) (A separate paste for each) and reply with a link here)

Patcher/launcher logs

>C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Patcher Logs

lolclient logs

>C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\[VERSION NUMBER]\deploy\logs\

Logged in today and i have same problem, screen goes black after pressing Launch, and also when i log account in. EVENTUALLY screen logs in, took about 10 minutes to appear. Did you end up resolving this? Game client was fine last night.
